text:
Hi, I believe you can find it here:
<http://legacydocs.HubSpot.com|legacydocs.HubSpot.com>  <http://community.HubSpot.com|community.HubSpot.com>  <http://community.HubSpot.com|community.HubSpot.com>  <http://community.HubSpot.com|community.HubSpot.com> 

But as I know 
You can make a HubSpot form
Setup a web hook trigger when the form is submitted,  In the webhook, use the HubSpot Workflows API to create a workflow that triggers when the form is submitted.
In the workflow, use the HTTP request action to send a request to your custom API endpoint. I hope this helps a little bit, let me know if you need help!
